prompt.title: Knowledge

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, extract the important knowledge from the document.

# Rules

-   Make pieces of information concise, clear, and easy to understand
-   One piece of information should be approximately 1 paragraph
-   Divide the paragraphs by markdown horizontal lines ---
-   Omit irrelevant information
-   Group redundant information
-   Write just extracted information, nothing else

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgeContent}

promptResult.content:
Promptbook is a 4th generation programming language that translates natural language specifications into functional applications.

---

It allows users to write code using plain English, making programming accessible to non-programmers.

---

The platform is AI-native, utilizing concepts like personas, knowledge, and actions instead of traditional coding elements.

---

It enables rapid application development, allowing users to build AI applications in minutes.

---

Promptbook is an enterprise-ready solution with built-in security, privacy, encryption, testing, and scalability features.
